<<<<<<< HEAD
Poor Robins perambulation from Saffron-Walden to London performed this month of July, 1678. Poor Robin. Winstanley, William, 1628?-1698.
22 p.
Printed by T.E. and are to be sold by the General Assemby of Hawkers, London : 1678.
In verse. "With allowance, July 11, 1678, Ro. L'Estrange." William Winstanley is usually credited with authorship of the Poor Robin pamphlets--NUC pre-1956 imprints. Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
=======
